main event: Two witnesses observed a disc-shaped UFO that emitted red and white lights for 4.5 minutes in Potsdam, NY, on 10 May 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 4.5 minutes.,The UFO changed colors from red to white.,Witnesses reported seeing the object hovering near a factory.,The object was described as emitting a bright light and traveling at a high speed.,The report included notes on conflicting and questionable details about the sighting.
witness description: Witnesses reported seeing a bright object that was reddish in color and oval in shape.
